name: Atlas Gate
description:
Stranded on an island of paper, find your way off or stay and see it decay.
4 endings.

Get to the end of the pier to exit the game.



Music and Sound Design by: Gabi Mismash
Game by: Blood Machine
Made using HPSXRP by Pastafuture

Made for Madvent Calendar 2021 (GO PLAY IT!!!)
